While that may mean fun in the sun and a great reason to boost those mood-elevating vitamin D levels, it can also be a time for heartache. Grainy mustard packs a welcome punch and adds great texture to the cakes. Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are puréed glassy smooth.

While that may mean fun in the sun and a great reason to boost those mood-elevating vitamin D levels, it can also be a time for heartache. Grainy mustard packs a welcome punch and adds great texture to the cakes. Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are puréed glassy smooth.

Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are puréed glassy smooth.I could not find baby red potatoes so I used about 3/4 pound of small red potatoes cut into bite sized pieces. Grainy mustard packs a welcome punch and adds great texture to the cakes. Some of these soups can be served either hot or cold, some are filled to the brim with chunky vegetables and some are puréed glassy smooth.
